g.text: 5. Return success if decryption is successful
6. Request challenge for the public key
10. Send signed challenge and public key

g.id: WASM Service.Decrypts the key pairs using the passphrase and stores the decrypted keys in the global context
g.text: Decrypts the key pairs using the passphrase and stores the decrypted keys in the global context

g.id: WASM Service."signs the challenge using the decrypted private key stored in the global context.\n Passphrase is not sent here."

text.tspan: signs the challenge using the decrypted private key stored in the global context.

g.id: Server."Verifies the signature using the public key \n and returns a JWT token if the signature is valid."

text.tspan: Verifies the signature using the public key
and returns a JWT token if the signature is valid.
